etymology.description: Depicts a stylized representation of a heart
etymology.interpretation: The character 心(xīn, 'heart') visually represents the shape of a heart, emphasizing its central and essential role in both a physical and metaphorical sense.

examples.chinese: 他的心温暖无比(他的心溫暖無比)。
她把心放在艺术上(她把心放在藝術上)，追求完美(追求完美)。
examples.pinyin: Tā bǎ xīn fàng zài yìshù shàng, zhuīqiú wánměi.
examples.english: She dedicates her heart to art, pursuing perfection.

examples.chinese: 音乐直击心灵(音樂直擊心靈)。
examples.english: Music strikes straight at the heart (soul).
